mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS userId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.coin_total AS coinTotal, a.ci_phone AS ciPhone, a.create_date AS createDate, a.create_by AS createBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.remark_tips AS remarkTips FROM coin_account_info AS a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.user_id = #{userId}
